segments.text: From my view, the kitchen looks busy yet chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman focuses solely on drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her apron, looking content.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the faucet is on, overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot dips into the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate like a shield.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits with open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a peaceful yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast to this indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR
